Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Bird Watching
Activities.message_short: Discover why Mindo is a birdwatcher‚Äôs paradise!
Activities.message_long: Discover why Mindo is a birdwatcher‚Äôs paradise! Spot colorful toucans, countless hummingbirds, and the iconic Andean Cock-of-the-Rock ‚Äî with expert local bilingual guides leading the way. Over 550 bird species await in Ecuador‚Äôs magical cloud forest.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Waterfalls
Activities.message_short: Discover the magic of the Choc√≥ Andino Reserve ‚Äî a lush cloud forest with hidden waterfalls and the famous Nambillo fall.
Activities.message_long: Discover the magic of the Choc√≥ Andino Reserve ‚Äî a lush cloud forest with hidden waterfalls and the famous Nambillo fall. Glide across the canopy on a hummingbird-shaped cable car and feel the thrill of adventure in the heart of nature!

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Nambillo Waterfall
Activities.message_short: Dive into the crystal-clear Nambillo River!
Activities.message_long:
Dive into the crystal-clear Nambillo River! Swim, ride a natural 15-meter slide, or take the leap from thrilling 4- and 12-meter jumps. A refreshing cloud forest adventure just minutes from Mindo! 

Approximate Duration: 3 to 4 hours

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Quad Tour
Activities.message_short: Rev up your adrenaline on our Quad Tour!
Activities.message_long: Rev up your adrenaline on our Quad Tour! Ride through jungle trails, cross suspension bridges, and splash by the river ‚Äî all safely guided and fully equipped. An adventure-packed hour in the heart of Mindo!

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Canopy
Activities.message_short: Fly above the Mindo cloud forest on 10 thrilling zip lines spanning 3,500 meters!
Activities.message_long:
Fly above the Mindo cloud forest on 10 thrilling zip lines spanning 3,500 meters! Safe, certified, and led by expert guides ‚Äî this is the ultimate adventure in the treetops.

It can be enjoyed all day, from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Chocolate Tour
Activities.message_short: Discover the sweet side of Mindo on a one-hour Chocolate Tour!
Activities.message_long:
Discover the sweet side of Mindo on a one-hour Chocolate Tour! From cacao fruit to delicious treats, learn the artisanal process of making fine chocolate. End with a brownie tasting‚Äîor even a chocolate face mask!

Tour available from 8am to 6pm.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Coffee Tour
Activities.message_short: Awaken your senses on a Coffee Tour in Mindo!
Activities.message_long:
Awaken your senses on a Coffee Tour in Mindo! From bean to brew, explore the full journey‚Äîgrowth, artisanal roasting, and expert tasting. End by savoring a gourmet cup born in the cloud forest.

Tour available between 9am and 5pm.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Butterfly house
Activities.message_short: Step into a magical butterfly garden in Mindo!
Activities.message_long:
Step into a magical butterfly garden in Mindo! Witness over 1,000 butterflies in every stage of life, feed them by hand, and enjoy hummingbirds, orchids, and more. A perfect family experience!

Visiting hours are from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Orchid Garden Tour
Activities.message_short: Step into a living rainbow at Mindo‚Äôs Orchid Garden!
Activities.message_long:
Step into a living rainbow at Mindo‚Äôs Orchid Garden! Discover over 250 native species ‚Äî from the famous monkey-face orchid to dazzling hummingbird orchids ‚Äî all in a sanctuary of conservation and beauty.

Approximate Duration: 3 to 4 hours

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Frog Concert
Activities.message_short: Experience the ‚Äúfrog concert‚Äù in Mindo‚Äôs cloud forest at night!
Activities.message_long: Experience the ‚Äúfrog concert‚Äù in Mindo‚Äôs cloud forest at night! This 2-hour guided tour reveals frogs, insects, and maybe even sleeping birds ‚Äî all accompanied by the magical symphony of the forest.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Tubing
Activities.message_short:
Tubing - Rio Mindo

Rafting down the Mindo River (Level 1), a 3,500-meter course.

Price per person $8.00 + VAT
(minimum 4 people)
Activities.message_long:
Tubing - Rio Mindo

Rafting down the Mindo River (Level 1), a 3,500-meter course. Specialized guides. You have access to a hot shower and changing rooms. 
This activity includes local transportation.


Price per person $8.00 + VAT
(minimum 4 people)

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Tubing
Activities.message_short:
Tubing - Rio Cinto

Descent down the Cinto River (Level II), a 5,000-meter course.
Activities.message_long:
Tubing - Rio Cinto

Descent down the Cinto River (Level II), a 5,000-meter course. Specialized guides, complete equipment. You have access to a hot shower and changing rooms. This activity includes local transportation, 

Price per person $30.00 + VAT
(minimum 4 people)
Price from 1 to 3 people $90 usd

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Tubing
Activities.message_short:
Tubing - Rio Blanco

Rafting down the R√≠o Blanco (Level III), a 30-km route. 

(minimum 4 people)
Activities.message_long:
Tubing - Rio Blanco

Rafting down the R√≠o Blanco (Level III), a 30-km route. Specialized guides, complete equipment. Includes a cup of coffee at the end of the tour. Access to a hot shower and changing rooms. Local transportation included.

Price per person $48.00 + VAT
(minimum 4 people)
Price for 1 to 3 people $144.00 (Summer Season ‚Äì June to September)

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Rafting
Activities.message_short:
Feel the rush of whitewater rafting in Mindo‚Äôs wild rivers!


This activity takes place in Valle Hermoso (Santo Domingo de los Ts√°chilas)
Price: $60 per person (minimum 4 people)
from 1 to 3 people $180
Activities.message_long:
Feel the rush of whitewater rafting in Mindo‚Äôs wild rivers! Paddle through exciting rapids surrounded by the beauty of the cloud forest. An adventure full of adrenaline and nature in perfect harmony.

II: Easy level.  Slightly turbulent waters with gaps and waves no larger than 25 centimeters, and small whirlpools that pose no danger to swimmers.

III: Intermediate level.  Turbulent waters with gaps and medium-sized waves of no more than one meter, eddies that are dangerous for a swimmer and of some importance for a boat. Navigating requires good technique and knowledge of the river. There are some technical steps that require attention, which our expert guides are familiar with. 

 

This activity takes place in Valle Hermoso (Santo Domingo de los Ts√°chilas)
Price: $60 per person (minimum 4 people)
from 1 to 3 people $180

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Canyoning
Activities.message_short: Dive into adventure with canyoning in Mindo‚Äôs rivers ‚Äî waterfalls, natural pools, and vertical descents await!
Activities.message_long:
Dive into adventure with canyoning in Mindo‚Äôs rivers ‚Äî waterfalls, natural pools, and vertical descents await! Equipped with helmet, harness, and expert guides, this is pure adrenaline in the cloud forest.

Price per Person: $18.00
Minimum 2 People
45m waterfall.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Night Walk
Activities.message_short: Step into the magic of the cloud forest at night!
Activities.message_long: Step into the magic of the cloud forest at night! Discover frogs, snakes, insects, and even glowing wood on this 1-hour guided night walk.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Paintball
Activities.message_short: Gear up for an adrenaline rush in the Mindo forest!
Activities.message_long: Gear up for an adrenaline rush in the Mindo forest! With paintball guns, helmets, and 100 rounds included, challenge your friends or family on a battlefield full of obstacles. Fun, teamwork, and action await!

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Horseback Riding
Activities.message_short:
Explore Mindo‚Äôs cloud forest the classic way‚Äîon horseback!

Activity available from 9am to 4pm, with prior reservation.
Price: $18.00 per person per hour
Includes: local transportation, specialized guide, helmet and horse. 

Minimum 2 people
Activities.message_long:
Explore Mindo‚Äôs cloud forest the classic way‚Äîon horseback! Ride along ecological trails, rivers, and waterfalls, with tours lasting from one hour to a full day. A perfect mix of nature, adventure, and relaxation.

Activity available from 9am to 4pm, with prior reservation.
Price: $18.00 per person per hour
Includes: local transportation, specialized guide, helmet and horse. 

Minimum 2 people

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Mountain Biking
Activities.message_short: Pedal through cloud forest trails, rivers, and breathtaking Andean landscapes on our mountain biking tours.
Activities.message_long:
Pedal through cloud forest trails, rivers, and breathtaking Andean landscapes on our mountain biking tours. From short rides to epic circuits, every route is guided, adventurous, and unforgettable.

Price:  $6.00 per hour All day $20.00
Night Bike $20.00

(Minimum 2 people)

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Double Extreme Swing
Activities.message_short: Take the leap on Mindo‚Äôs Double Extreme Swing!
Activities.message_long: Take the leap on Mindo‚Äôs Double Extreme Swing! Soar up to 45 meters into the cloud forest, with helmets, harnesses, and guides ensuring a safe adrenaline rush.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Extreme Bike ‚Äì Sky Bike
Activities.message_short: Soar above the forest on Mindo‚Äôs Sky Ride!
Activities.message_long: Soar above the forest on Mindo‚Äôs Sky Ride! Pedal a suspended bicycle along a 400-meter cable for the ultimate mix of adventure and stunning nature views.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Sky Ride
Activities.message_short: Ride high above the cloud forest on Mindo‚Äôs thrilling double sky bike!
Activities.message_long: Ride high above the cloud forest on Mindo‚Äôs thrilling double sky bike! Pedal 400 meters round-trip with a friend and take in breathtaking views from the treetops. Adventure and scenery all in one!

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 1. What type of tours do you offer? Birdwatching, adventure, food experiences, and private custom routes.
Questions.message_short:
1. What type of tours do you offer?

Birdwatching, adventure, food experiences, and private custom routes.
Questions.message_long:
1. What type of tours do you offer?

Birdwatching, adventure, food experiences, and private custom routes.

We offer a full range of experiences in üìçMindo, Ecuador, including:
-Half-Day Birdwatching Tours
-Full-Day Birdwatching Tours
-Adventure Tours (ziplining, waterfalls, tubing, hiking)
-Coffee and Chocolate Experiences
-Customized private tours (photography, rare species targets, family groups)

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 2. What times are the birdwatching tours? Early mornings offer the highest chances to see the most species.
Questions.message_short:
2. What times are the birdwatching tours?

Early mornings offer the highest chances to see the most species
Questions.message_long:
2. What times are the birdwatching tours?

Early mornings offer the highest chances to see the most species.
Half-Day:
5:00 AM ‚Äì 10:00 AM

Full-Day:
5:00 AM ‚Äì 3:00 PM
Early mornings usually deliver the best activity and variety.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 3. What is included in the birdwatching tour? Transport, entry fees, optics, and a bilingual birding guide.
Questions.message_short:
3. What is included in the birdwatching tour?

Transport, entry fees, optics, and a bilingual birding guide.
Questions.message_long:
3. What is included in the birdwatching tour?

Transport, entry fees, optics, and a bilingual birding guide.

Every birdwatching tour includes:
-Round-trip transportation
-Entry fees for parks, reserves, or private birding areas
-Use of high-quality binoculars
-Use of spotting monocular or scope
-Expert bilingual birding guide
-Bird checklists and photography support

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 4. Is there a limit on birdwatching tour size? No fixed limit. Pricing is based on a minimum of 2 guests.
Questions.message_short:
4. Is there a limit on birdwatching tour size?

No fixed limit. Pricing is based on a minimum of 2 guests.

No. We can accommodate tours of any size.
Questions.message_long:
4. Is there a limit on birdwatching tour size?

No fixed limit. Pricing is based on a minimum of 2 guests.

No. We can accommodate tours of any size.

Pricing is based on a minimum of 2 guests.

Solo travelers are welcome. If you‚Äôre traveling alone, we‚Äôll try to place you in an existing group so you only pay the per-person rate.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 5. How many birds can we expect to see? Species count varies by weather and route.
Questions.message_short:
5. How many birds can we expect to see?

Species count varies by weather and route.

Mindo is one of the most biodiverse places on the planet.
Questions.message_long:
5. How many birds can we expect to see?

Species count varies by weather and route.

Mindo is one of the most biodiverse places on the planet.

Half-day tours may see
10‚Äì25 species on average.

Full-day tours can reach
25+ species, depending on weather and locations chosen.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 6. Are the tours suitable for beginners? Yes. We adjust pace and teaching level to your comfort.
Questions.message_short:
6. Are the tours suitable for beginners?  

Yes. We adjust pace and teaching level to your comfort.
Questions.message_long:
6. Are the tours suitable for beginners?  

Yes. We adjust pace and teaching level to your comfort.

Absolutely. Our guides work with:
-First-time birders
-Families with kids
-Advanced photographers
-Professional ornithologists

We adjust the tour pace to your comfort level.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 7. What should I bring for a birdwatching tour? Dress for changing cloud forest weather.
Questions.message_short:
7. What should I bring for a birdwatching tour?

Dress for changing cloud forest weather.
Questions.message_long:
7. What should I bring for a birdwatching tour?

Dress for changing cloud forest weather.

We recommend:
-Comfortable walking shoes
-Lightweight long sleeves
-Rain jacket (weather changes quickly)
-Water bottle
-Sunscreen and insect repellent
-Camera (optional)
-We can help you spot and photograph birds during the tour.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 8. Do I need to be physically fit for the tour? Most routes are easy to moderate and can be customized.
Questions.message_short:
8. Do I need to be physically fit for the tour?

Most routes are easy to moderate and can be customized.
Questions.message_long:
8. Do I need to be physically fit for the tour?

Most routes are easy to moderate and can be customized.

Most tours involve easy to moderate walking, and routes can be customized based on your preference:
-Easy boardwalks
-Moderate forest trails
-More challenging target-species hikes

Just tell us your comfort level and goals.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 9. How do I book a tour? Book on the site or message WhatsApp for fast confirmation.
Questions.message_short:
9. How do I book a tour?

Book on the site or message WhatsApp for fast confirmation.
Questions.message_long:
9. How do I book a tour?

Book on the site or message WhatsApp for fast confirmation.

You can:
-Book directly through our website
-Contact us on WhatsApp

We reply quickly and confirm all tour details in advance.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 10. Do you offer private tours? Great for photographers, families, couples, and rare-species goals.
Questions.message_short:
10. Do you offer private tours?

Yes, Great for photographers, families, couples, and rare-species goals.
Questions.message_long:
10. Do you offer private tours?

Yes, Great for photographers, families, couples, and rare-species goals.

Yes. Private tours are available for:
-Photographers
-Couples
-Families
-Birding clubs
-Serious birders targeting rare species

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 11. What happens if it rains? Light rain is common. Tours continue unless unsafe.
Questions.message_short:
11. What happens if it rains?

Light rain is common. Tours continue unless unsafe.
Questions.message_long:
11. What happens if it rains?

Light rain is common. Tours continue unless unsafe.

Mindo is a cloud forest, so light rain is common. Tours usually continue unless weather becomes unsafe.
Our guides know alternative routes and sheltered viewing points.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 12. Are the tours child-friendly? Yes. We can slow down and keep the experience engaging.
Questions.message_short:
12. Are the tours child-friendly?

Yes. We can slow down and keep the experience engaging.
Questions.message_long:
12. Are the tours child-friendly?

Yes. We can slow down and keep the experience engaging.

Yes. Many families join our tours. We offer:
-Slower pacing
-Easier trails
-Interactive wildlife explanations to keep kids engaged

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 13. Do you offer transportation from Quito? Private transport is available. We can also help with bus directions.
Questions.message_short:
13. Do you offer transportation from Quito?

Private transport is available. We can also help with bus directions.
Questions.message_long:
13. Do you offer transportation from Quito?

Private transport is available. We can also help with bus directions.

Yes. We can arrange private round-trip transport from Quito for an additional fee.
We also assist with bus directions if you prefer public transportation.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 14. What language does your guide speak? English and Spanish.
Questions.message_short:
14. What language does your guide speak?

English and Spanish.
Questions.message_long:
14. What language does your guide speak?

English and Spanish.

Our guides speak English and Spanish. They are experienced at explaining bird behavior, ecology, and photography tips.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 15. Can I use my own binoculars or camera gear? Yes. We provide optics too at no extra cost.
Questions.message_short:
15. Can I use my own binoculars or camera gear?

Yes. We provide optics too at no extra cost.
Questions.message_long:
15. Can I use my own binoculars or camera gear?

Yes. We provide optics too at no extra cost.

Absolutely. Guests are welcome to bring personal equipment.
If you don‚Äôt have gear, we provide binoculars and a spotting scope at no extra cost.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 16. Do you help with bird photography? Yes. We help with positioning, light, and quick setups.
Questions.message_short:
16. Do you help with bird photography?

Yes. We help with positioning, light, and quick setups.
Questions.message_long:
16. Do you help with bird photography?

Yes. We help with positioning, light, and quick setups.

Yes. Our guides specialize in photography support, including:
-Locating birds
-Positioning for good light
-Helping beginners set up simple shots
-Scoping birds for high-quality smartphone photos

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 17. Which species can we expect to see? Routes are tailored. Sightings depend on season and goals.
Questions.message_short:
17. Which species can we expect to see?

Routes are tailored. Sightings depend on season and goals.
Questions.message_long:
17. Which species can we expect to see?

Routes are tailored. Sightings depend on season and goals.

Depending on the season and route, sightings may include:
-Toucans
-Tanagers
-Andean Cock-of-the-Rock
-Umbrella Bird
-Antpittas
-Quetzals
-Hummingbirds (more than 30 species)
-Owls (night tours also available)

We tailor the tour based on your interests.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 18. Is lunch included in full-day tours? Lunch is not included. Full-day tours include a lunch stop.
Questions.message_short:
18. Is lunch included in full-day tours?

Lunch is not included. Full-day tours include a lunch stop.
Questions.message_long:
18. Is lunch included in full-day tours?

Lunch is not included. Full-day tours include a lunch stop.

No. Full-day tours include:
-Lunch stop
-Coffee or hot chocolate (depending on the tour type)

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 19. Are night tours available? Yes. Night walks must be booked in advance.
Questions.message_short:
19. Are night tours available?

Yes. Night walks must be booked in advance.
Questions.message_long:
19. Are night tours available?

Yes. Night walks must be booked in advance.

Yes. We offer night walks to spot:
-Owls
-Nightjars
-Insects
-Frogs
-Nocturnal mammals

Night tours must be booked in advance.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 20. What is your cancellation policy? Full refund 48+ hours before. Same-day may incur a fee.
Questions.message_short:
20. What is your cancellation policy?

Full refund 48+ hours before. Same-day may incur a fee.
Questions.message_long:
20. What is your cancellation policy?

Full refund 48+ hours before. Same-day may incur a fee.

Cancellations made 48 hours or more before the tour receive a full refund.

Same-day cancellations may incur a fee due to guide reservation and transportation costs.

Tours.subject: Tours
Tours.title: Full Day Tour - Quest for Five Toucans & the Andean Cock-of-the-Rock
Tours.message_short:
Full Day (5 AM - 3 PM) | $99 per person min 2

https://mindobirdwatching.com/tours-full-day/
Tours.message_long:
Duration: Full Day (5 AM - 3 PM)
Price: $99 per person min 2.

Highlights: ‚Ä¢ Andean Cock-of-the-rock observation at dawn; Extended forest hike in search of five toucan varieties: Plate-billed Mountain Toucan, Yellow Throated Toucan, Choco Toucan, Collared Aracari, Crimson-rumped Toucanet; Immersive full-day cloud forest adventure.

Included: Transportation, reserve entrance fees and use of binoculars

Duraci√≥n Aproximada: 3 a 4 horas

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Concierto de Ranas
Activities.message_short: ¬°Vive el ‚Äúconcierto de ranas‚Äù en el bosque nublado de Mindo por la noche!
Activities.message_long: ¬°Vive el ‚Äúconcierto de ranas‚Äù en el bosque nublado de Mindo por la noche! Este recorrido guiado de 2 horas revela ranas, insectos y hasta aves dormidas, todo acompa√±ado por la m√°gica sinfon√≠a del bosque.

Activities.message_long:
Descenso por el R√≠o Mindo (Nivel I), recorrido de 3.500 mts. Gu√≠as especializados. Puede acceder a una ducha de agua caliente y vestidores, esta actividad incluye transporte local.

transporte local,

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Rafting
Activities.message_short:
¬°Siente la adrenalina del rafting en los r√≠os salvajes de Mindo!

Esta actividad se realiza en Valle Hermoso (Santo Domingo de los Ts√°chilas)
Precio: $60por persona (m√≠nimo 4 personas)
de 1 a 3 personas $180
Activities.message_long:
¬°Siente la adrenalina del rafting en los r√≠os salvajes de Mindo! Rema entre r√°pidos emocionantes rodeado de la belleza del bosque nublado. Una aventura llena de emoci√≥n y naturaleza en perfecta armon√≠a.

II: nivel f√°cil. Aguas un poco turbulentas con huecos y olas de no m√°s de 25 cent√≠metros, remolinos peque√±os sin peligro alguno para un nadador.

III: nivel intermedio. Aguas turbulentas con huecos y olas medianas de no m√°s de un metro, remolinos de cuidado para un nadador y de alguna consideraci√≥n para una embarcaci√≥n. La navegaci√≥n requiere buena t√©cnica y conocimiento del r√≠o. Existen algunos pasos t√©cnicos de atenci√≥n, conocidos por nuestros gu√≠as expertos. 

 
Esta actividad se realiza en Valle Hermoso (Santo Domingo de los Ts√°chilas)
Precio: $60por persona (m√≠nimo 4 personas)
de 1 a 3 personas $180

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Canyoning
Activities.message_short: ¬°Sum√©rgete en la aventura del canyoning en los r√≠os de Mindo ‚Äî cascadas, pozas naturales y descensos verticales te esperan!
Activities.message_long:
¬°Sum√©rgete en la aventura del canyoning en los r√≠os de Mindo ‚Äî cascadas, pozas naturales y descensos verticales te esperan! Con casco, arn√©s y gu√≠as expertos, es pura adrenalina en el bosque nublado.

Valor por Persona: $18.00
M√≠nimo 2 Personas
Cascada de 45mts.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Caminata Nocturna
Activities.message_short: ¬°Ad√©ntrate en la magia del bosque nublado de noche!
Activities.message_long: ¬°Ad√©ntrate en la magia del bosque nublado de noche! Descubre ranas, serpientes, insectos y hasta madera fosforescente en esta caminata guiada de 1 hora.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Paint Ball
Activities.message_short: ¬°Prep√°rate para una descarga de adrenalina en el bosque de Mindo!
Activities.message_long: ¬°Prep√°rate para una descarga de adrenalina en el bosque de Mindo! Con marcadoras, cascos y 100 balas incluidas, reta a tus amigos o familia en un campo lleno de obst√°culos. ¬°Diversi√≥n, trabajo en equipo y acci√≥n garantizada!

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Paseo a Caballo
Activities.message_short: ¬°Explora el bosque nublado de Mindo de la forma m√°s cl√°sica: a caballo!
Activities.message_long:
¬°Explora el bosque nublado de Mindo de la forma m√°s cl√°sica: a caballo! Recorre senderos ecol√≥gicos, r√≠os y cascadas, en tours que van desde una hora hasta un d√≠a completo. Una mezcla perfecta de naturaleza, aventura y relajaci√≥n.

Actividad disponible de 9am a 4pm, con reserva previa.

Precio: $18.00 por persona por hora
Incluye: transporte local, gu√≠a especializado, casco y caballo. 

M√≠nimo 2 personas

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Ciclismo
Activities.message_short: Pedalea por senderos del bosque nublado, r√≠os y paisajes andinos impresionantes en nuestros tours de ciclismo de monta√±a.
Activities.message_long:
Pedalea por senderos del bosque nublado, r√≠os y paisajes andinos impresionantes en nuestros tours de ciclismo de monta√±a. Desde recorridos cortos hasta circuitos √©picos, cada ruta es guiada, aventurera e inolvidable.

Tambi√©n podemos organizar la cicleada nocturna en una ruta lastrada junto al r√≠o Mindo, alejada de la tecnolog√≠a y el estr√©s diario mientras se escuchan los sonidos del bosque y se descubren m√°gicas criaturas.

Precio: $6.00 por hora Todo el d√≠a $20.00
Bicicleta Nocturna $20.00
(M√≠nimo 2 personas)

*PRECIO APLICA EN MINDO

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Columpio Extremo Doble
Activities.message_short: ¬°Atr√©vete con el Double Extreme Swing de Mindo!
Activities.message_long: ¬°Atr√©vete con el Double Extreme Swing de Mindo! L√°nzate hasta 45 metros sobre el bosque nublado, con cascos, arneses y gu√≠as que garantizan una aventura segura y llena de adrenalina.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Bicicleta Extrema - Sky Bike
Activities.message_short: ¬°Surca el bosque en el Sky Ride de Mindo!
Activities.message_long: ¬°Surca el bosque en el Sky Ride de Mindo! Pedalea una bicicleta suspendida en un cable de 400 metros para vivir la mezcla perfecta de aventura y paisajes espectaculares.

Activities.subject: Activities
Activities.title: Sky Ride
Activities.message_short: ¬°Pedalea en lo alto del bosque nublado en la emocionante bicicleta a√©rea doble de Mindo!
Activities.message_long: ¬°Pedalea en lo alto del bosque nublado en la emocionante bicicleta a√©rea doble de Mindo! Recorre 400 metros ida y vuelta con un amigo y disfruta de vistas impresionantes desde las copas de los √°rboles. ¬°Aventura y paisajes en uno solo!

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 1. Que tipo de tours ofrecen? Avistamiento de aves, aventura, experiencias gastronomicas y rutas privadas a tu medida.
Questions.message_short:
1. Que tipo de tours ofrecen?

Avistamiento de aves, aventura, experiencias gastronomicas y rutas privadas a tu medida.
Questions.message_long:
1. Que tipo de tours ofrecen?

Avistamiento de aves, aventura, experiencias gastronomicas y rutas privadas a tu medida.

Ofrecemos una gama completa de experiencias en üìçMindo, Ecuador, incluyendo:
-Tours de avistamiento de aves de medio dia
-Tours de avistamiento de aves de dia completo
-Tours de aventura (canopy, cascadas, tubing, caminatas)
-Experiencias de cafe y chocolate
-Tours privados personalizados (fotografia, especies objetivo, familias o grupos)

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 2. A que hora son los tours de avistamiento de aves? Las primeras horas de la manana suelen dar las mejores oportunidades y mas especies.
Questions.message_short:
2. A que hora son los tours de avistamiento de aves?

Las primeras horas de la manana suelen dar las mejores oportunidades y mas especies.
Questions.message_long:
2. A que hora son los tours de avistamiento de aves?

Las primeras horas de la manana suelen dar las mejores oportunidades y mas especies.

Medio dia:
5:00 AM - 10:00 AM

Dia completo:
5:00 AM - 3:00 PM
En general, temprano hay mas actividad y mayor variedad.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 3. Que incluye el tour de avistamiento de aves? Transporte, entradas, optica y un guia bilingue.
Questions.message_short:
3. Que incluye el tour de avistamiento de aves?

Transporte, entradas, optica y un guia bilingue.
Questions.message_long:
3. Que incluye el tour de avistamiento de aves?

Transporte, entradas, optica y un guia bilingue.

Cada tour de avistamiento de aves incluye:
-Transporte ida y vuelta
-Entradas a parques, reservas o areas privadas
-Uso de binoculares de alta calidad
-Uso de monocular o telescopio (scope)
-Guia experto bilingue
-Listas de aves y apoyo para fotografia

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 4. Hay un limite de personas por tour? No hay un limite fijo. El precio se basa en un minimo de 2 personas.
Questions.message_short:
4. Hay un limite de personas por tour?

No hay un limite fijo. El precio se basa en un minimo de 2 personas.
Questions.message_long:
4. Hay un limite de personas por tour?

No hay un limite fijo. El precio se basa en un minimo de 2 personas.

No. Podemos acomodar tours de cualquier tamano.
El precio se basa en un minimo de 2 personas.
Viajeros solos son bienvenidos. Si viajas solo, intentaremos ubicarte en un grupo existente para que pagues la tarifa por persona.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 5. Cuantas aves podemos esperar ver? La cantidad de especies varia segun el clima y la ruta.
Questions.message_short:
5. Cuantas aves podemos esperar ver?

La cantidad de especies varia segun el clima y la ruta.
Questions.message_long:
5. Cuantas aves podemos esperar ver?

La cantidad de especies varia segun el clima y la ruta.

Mindo es uno de los lugares mas biodiversos del planeta.
En medio dia se pueden ver
10-25
especies en promedio.
En dia completo se puede llegar a
25+
especies, segun el clima y los sitios elegidos.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 6. Los tours son adecuados para principiantes? Si. Ajustamos el ritmo y el nivel de explicacion segun tu comodidad.
Questions.message_short:
6. Los tours son adecuados para principiantes?

Si. Ajustamos el ritmo y el nivel de explicacion segun tu comodidad.
Questions.message_long:
6. Los tours son adecuados para principiantes?

Si. Ajustamos el ritmo y el nivel de explicacion segun tu comodidad.

Por supuesto. Nuestros guias trabajan con:
-Personas que observan aves por primera vez
-Familias con ninos
-Fotografos avanzados
-Ornitologos profesionales
-Ajustamos el ritmo del tour a tu nivel de comodidad.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 7. Que debo llevar para un tour de avistamiento de aves? Vistete para el clima cambiante del bosque nublado.
Questions.message_short:
7. Que debo llevar para un tour de avistamiento de aves?

Vistete para el clima cambiante del bosque nublado.
Questions.message_long:
7. Que debo llevar para un tour de avistamiento de aves?

Vistete para el clima cambiante del bosque nublado.

Recomendamos:
-Zapatos comodos para caminar
-Ropa ligera de manga larga
-Chaqueta impermeable (el clima cambia rapido)
-Botella de agua
-Bloqueador solar y repelente
-Camara (opcional)
-Durante el tour podemos ayudarte a ubicar y fotografiar aves.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 8. Necesito estar en buena condicion fisica? La mayoria de rutas son faciles a moderadas y se pueden adaptar.
Questions.message_short:
8. Necesito estar en buena condicion fisica?

La mayoria de rutas son faciles a moderadas y se pueden adaptar.
Questions.message_long:
8. Necesito estar en buena condicion fisica?

La mayoria de rutas son faciles a moderadas y se pueden adaptar.

La mayoria de tours incluyen caminatas faciles a moderadas, y las rutas pueden ajustarse segun tu preferencia:
-Senderos faciles y pasarelas
-Caminos moderados en bosque
-Caminatas mas exigentes para especies objetivo
-Solo cuentanos tu nivel de comodidad y tus objetivos.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 9. Como reservo un tour? Reserva en la web o escribe por WhatsApp para confirmacion rapida.
Questions.message_short:
9. Como reservo un tour?

Reserva en la web o escribe por WhatsApp para confirmacion rapida.
Questions.message_long:
9. Como reservo un tour?

Reserva en la web o escribe por WhatsApp para confirmacion rapida.

Puedes:
-Reservar directamente en nuestro sitio web
-Contactarnos por WhatsApp
-Respondemos rapido y confirmamos todos los detalles con anticipacion.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 10. Ofrecen tours privados? Ideal para fotografos, familias, parejas y objetivos de especies raras.
Questions.message_short:
10. Ofrecen tours privados?

Ideal para fotografos, familias, parejas y objetivos de especies raras.
Questions.message_long:
10. Ofrecen tours privados?

Ideal para fotografos, familias, parejas y objetivos de especies raras.

Si. Hay tours privados para:
-Fotografos
-Parejas
-Familias
-Clubes de observacion de aves
-Aficionados serios que buscan especies raras

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 11. Que pasa si llueve? La llovizna es comun. El tour continua a menos que sea inseguro.
Questions.message_short:
11. Que pasa si llueve?

La llovizna es comun. El tour continua a menos que sea inseguro.
Questions.message_long:
11. Que pasa si llueve?

La llovizna es comun. El tour continua a menos que sea inseguro.

Mindo es un bosque nublado, asi que la llovizna es comun. Por lo general los tours continuan a menos que el clima se vuelva inseguro.
Nuestros guias conocen rutas alternativas y puntos con resguardo.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 12. Los tours son aptos para ninos? Si. Podemos ir mas despacio y mantener la experiencia entretenida.
Questions.message_short:
12. Los tours son aptos para ninos?

Si. Podemos ir mas despacio y mantener la experiencia entretenida.
Questions.message_long:
12. Los tours son aptos para ninos?

Si. Podemos ir mas despacio y mantener la experiencia entretenida.

Si. Muchas familias se unen a nuestros tours. Ofrecemos:
-Ritmo mas lento
-Senderos mas faciles
-Explicaciones interactivas de fauna para mantener a los ninos interesados

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 13. Ofrecen transporte desde Quito? Hay transporte privado. Tambien te ayudamos con indicaciones de bus.
Questions.message_short:
13. Ofrecen transporte desde Quito?

Hay transporte privado. Tambien te ayudamos con indicaciones de bus.
Questions.message_long:
13. Ofrecen transporte desde Quito?

Hay transporte privado. Tambien te ayudamos con indicaciones de bus.

Si. Podemos coordinar transporte privado ida y vuelta desde Quito con un costo adicional.
Tambien podemos ayudarte con indicaciones de bus si prefieres transporte publico.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 14. En que idioma habla el guia? Ingles y espanol.
Questions.message_short:
14. En que idioma habla el guia?

Ingles y espanol.
Questions.message_long:
14. En que idioma habla el guia?

Ingles y espanol.

Nuestros guias hablan ingles y espanol. Tienen experiencia explicando comportamiento de aves, ecologia y consejos de fotografia.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 15. Puedo usar mis propios binoculares o equipo de camara? Si. Tambien proporcionamos optica sin costo extra.
Questions.message_short:
15. Puedo usar mis propios binoculares o equipo de camara?

Si. Tambien proporcionamos optica sin costo extra.
Questions.message_long:
15. Puedo usar mis propios binoculares o equipo de camara?

Si. Tambien proporcionamos optica sin costo extra.

Claro. Puedes traer tu propio equipo.
Si no tienes, te prestamos binoculares y un telescopio (scope) sin costo adicional.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 16. Ayudan con fotografia de aves? Si. Te ayudamos con posicion, luz y configuraciones rapidas.
Questions.message_short:
16. Ayudan con fotografia de aves?

Si. Te ayudamos con posicion, luz y configuraciones rapidas.
Questions.message_long:
16. Ayudan con fotografia de aves?

Si. Te ayudamos con posicion, luz y configuraciones rapidas.

Si. Nuestros guias apoyan con fotografia, incluyendo:
-Localizar aves
-Ubicarte para mejor luz
-Ayudar a principiantes con tomas simples
-Usar scope para fotos de alta calidad con smartphone

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 17. Que especies podemos ver? Las rutas se ajustan. Los avistamientos dependen de la temporada y tus objetivos.
Questions.message_short:
17. Que especies podemos ver?

Las rutas se ajustan. Los avistamientos dependen de la temporada y tus objetivos.
Questions.message_long:
17. Que especies podemos ver?

Las rutas se ajustan. Los avistamientos dependen de la temporada y tus objetivos.

Segun la temporada y la ruta, los avistamientos pueden incluir:
-Tucanes
-Tangaras
-Gallo de la pena andino
-Ave paraguas
-Hormigueros (antpittas)
-Quetzales
-Colibries (mas de 30 especies)
-Buhos (tambien hay tours nocturnos)
-Adaptamos el tour segun tus intereses.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 18. El almuerzo esta incluido en los tours de dia completo? El almuerzo no esta incluido. Los tours de dia completo incluyen una parada para almorzar.
Questions.message_short:
18. El almuerzo esta incluido en los tours de dia completo?

El almuerzo no esta incluido. Los tours de dia completo incluyen una parada para almorzar.
Questions.message_long:
18. El almuerzo esta incluido en los tours de dia completo?

El almuerzo no esta incluido. Los tours de dia completo incluyen una parada para almorzar.

No. Los tours de dia completo incluyen:
-Parada para almuerzo
-Cafe o chocolate caliente (segun el tipo de tour)

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 19. Hay tours nocturnos? Si. Las caminatas nocturnas deben reservarse con anticipacion.
Questions.message_short:
19. Hay tours nocturnos?

Si. Las caminatas nocturnas deben reservarse con anticipacion.
Questions.message_long:
19. Hay tours nocturnos?

Si. Las caminatas nocturnas deben reservarse con anticipacion.

Si. Ofrecemos caminatas nocturnas para ver:
-Buhos
-Chotacabras (nightjars)
-Insectos
-Ranas
-Mamiferos nocturnos
Los tours nocturnos deben reservarse con anticipacion.

Questions.subject: Questions
Questions.title: 20. Cual es su politica de cancelacion? Reembolso total con 48+ horas. El mismo dia puede tener un cargo.
Questions.message_short:
20. Cual es su politica de cancelacion?

Reembolso total con 48+ horas. El mismo dia puede tener un cargo.
Questions.message_long:
20. Cual es su politica de cancelacion?

Reembolso total con 48+ horas. El mismo dia puede tener un cargo.

Las cancelaciones realizadas con 48 horas o mas de anticipacion reciben reembolso total.
Las cancelaciones el mismo dia pueden tener un cargo debido a la reserva del guia y costos de transporte.
